?n
i
Dear Harry
I plan in arriving in New York on
Wednesday, October 27th. Unfortu¬
nately, the Board will have concluded
its meetings by that time. However,
if there is any matter of such impor¬
tance that you feel my presence is
necessary, please wire me and I can
make arrangements to be there earlier.
If not, I will look forward to seeing
you on Wednesday.
I was in New York yesterday and saw
Sy, who gave me a complete description
of the convention plans. It looks
like it will be a
H. Marks
